name.japanese: 海軍艦船 - 18番艦隊ギャラリー

description: A Marine vessel belonging to the 18th Fleet Gallery, equipped with a kitchen where Tajio works as an apprentice chef under a head chef.

keyEvents.title: Tajio Falls Overboard
keyEvents.description: Tajio falls overboard from this Marine vessel while attempting to gather ingredients.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Tajio works and from where the episode's plot begins.

keyEvents.title: Tajio Returns to Marine Vessel
keyEvents.description: Tajio returns to the Marine vessel with his completed curry.
keyEvents.significance: Resolution point where Tajio delivers the curry and covers for the Straw Hats.

keyEvents.title: Tajio Covers for the Straw Hats
keyEvents.description: Back on the Marine vessel, Tajio protects the Straw Hats by not revealing their help.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the bonds formed transcending pirate-Marine boundaries.

statusHistory.reason: Operating Marine vessel in the Grand Line

name.japanese: ゴーイング・メリー号

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, a caravel gifted by Kaya. In this episode, it serves as the location where Sanji teaches Tajio cooking.

keyEvents.title: Encounter with Marine Ships
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry navigates through fog and encounters Marine vessels.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the episode's main encounter.

keyEvents.title: Robin Rescues Tajio Aboard Going Merry
keyEvents.description: Robin brings Tajio aboard the Going Merry after rescuing him from drowning.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the crew interacts with Tajio.

keyEvents.title: Sanji's Cooking Lesson
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry's kitchen becomes a classroom where Sanji teaches Tajio.
keyEvents.significance: Central location for the episode's main teaching and cooking scenes.

keyEvents.title: Escape Through the Fog
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry safely escapes the foggy area with Marine ships.
keyEvents.significance: Concludes the episode with successful escape.

description: A floating restaurant in the East Blue where Sanji trained under Chef Zeff. Appears in flashback in this episode.

keyEvents.title: Flashback to Zeff's Teaching at Baratie
keyEvents.description: Sanji recalls his training at the Baratie, where Zeff taught him through observation.
keyEvents.significance: Provides context for Sanji's teaching methods and philosophy.
